subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick had to work harder than expected to suppress an upset bid from Nicolas Mahut in a 6-1, 6-7 (8), 6-3 victory in the second round at the Rogers Cup in Toronto on Tuesday. Tommy Haas advanced to the second round in this Master Series event with a 6-3, 6-2 win over Carlos Moyà. Rain halted play in the afternoon.
